snippet: The Boy Scouts of America, which earlier said it was reconsidering a ban on participation by openly gay people, will put off a decision until May.
abstract: Boy Scouts of America, which earlier said it was reconsidering a ban on participation by openly gay people, will put off decision until May 2013.

byline.contributor: Lauren D’Avolio contributed reporting from Irving, Tex.

lead_paragraph: The Boy Scouts of America, which earlier said it was reconsidering a ban on participation by openly gay people, will put off a decision until May.

headline.seo: Boy Scouts Postpone Decision on Gays
headline.main: After Floating Idea of Lifting Ban on Gays, Scouts Delay Decision
headline.print_headline: After Floating Idea of Lifting Ban on Gays, Scouts Delay Decision
